@cityandguildsare exams still going to go ahead for level 3 Animal Management Advanced technical Diploma

I broadly agree but there's one element few discuss & it's how learners are retained. SMEs train 7 in 10 construction apprentices & make up 90% of training capacity. If they dont have work pipelines, learners don't progress. Until that is a central understanding, nothing changes.
